article: Once a wise man was traveling with some of his . They _ to pass a lake and they stopped there for a _ . The man told one of his disciples," I'm _ . Do get me some water from that lake." Just as the disciple reached it, a cart started _ the lake. As a result, the water became very _ and muddy. The disciple thought, " _ can I give this water to my teacher to drink!" So he came back and said, "The water is very muddy. I don't think it is _ to drink." After half an hour, the wise man asked the _ disciple to get him some water. The disciple went back and found the lake was _ muddy. He returned and _ the wise man that the water was unfit to drink. After another hour, the man again asked the disciple to get him a _ . The disciple reached the lake to find it calm and still. The mud had settled down and the water was clean and clear. So he _ some water and brought it to the wise man. The wise man looked at the water, saying, "See what you _ to make the water clean. You let it be -- The _ settled down on its own and you got the clear water. Our _ is also like that! When it is disturbed, just let it be, Give it a little _ . It will settle down on its own." So remember, the next time a(n) _ has you all , just let it be; don't _ immediately. Let the Mud settle and come back to the situation _ .
